p: The present study was conducted to compare the total number of measles cases reported during COVID-19 epidemic between January to August 2020 comapred to the same time period in 2019. The data source utilized for this study is based on the surveillance records available at the Sub-regional Reference Measles Surveillance Laboratory, National Institute of Health, Islamabad, which is the national public health institute supporting disease surveillance and epidemiology programs across Pakistan.
